scripts.build: npx concurrently "cd app1; yarn build" "cd app2; yarn build"
scripts.serve: npx concurrently "cd app1; yarn serve" "cd app2; yarn serve"
scripts.clean: npx concurrently "cd app1; yarn clean" "cd app2; yarn clean"
scripts.e2e:ci: yarn start & npx wait-on http-get://localhost:3001/ && npx cypress run --config-file ../cypress/config/cypress.config.ts --config '{"supportFile": "../cypress/support/e2e.ts"}' --spec "./e2e/*.cy.ts" --browser=chrome
